<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtLegalFunc = &#91;=&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery">LegalityQuery</a> &amp;Query) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DstSize = Query.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery/#ab28fca6f8145be28b70ad89bb0c741b0">Types</a>&#91;0&#93;.getSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle legal vectors using legalFor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Query.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery/#ab28fca6f8145be28b70ad89bb0c741b0">Types</a>&#91;0&#93;.isVector())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstSize &lt; 8 || DstSize &gt;= 128 || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(DstSize))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extending to a scalar s128 needs narrowing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> &amp;SrcTy = Query.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery/#ab28fca6f8145be28b70ad89bb0c741b0">Types</a>&#91;1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure we fit in a register otherwise. Don&#39;t bother checking that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the source type is below 128 bits. We shouldn&#39;t be allowing anything</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// through which is wider than the destination in the first place.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcSize = SrcTy.getSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcSize &lt; 8 || !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(SrcSize))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to break down into smaller vectors as long as they&#39;re at least 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bits. This lets us use vector operations for some parts of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reduction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><Highlight kind="normal">      .fewerElementsIf(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#91;=&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery">LegalityQuery</a> &amp;Q) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> SrcTy = Q.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/legalityquery/#ab28fca6f8145be28b70ad89bb0c741b0">Types</a>&#91;1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcTy.isScalar())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(SrcTy.getNumElements()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can usually perform 64b vector operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcTy.getSizeInBits() &gt; 64;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> DstReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64isd/#a35ad1b8db0dfad0b69c9185c5fe24e19aa2e9d9d7c30818fd5ba551f8d3f0af34">ADRP</a> = MIRBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a8bc92b8a902afb7675480ecc729a66d4">buildInstr</a>(AArch64::ADRP, &#123;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a7ff0361855acbbe71b15b8dc6003fbc5">LLT::pointer</a>(0, 64)&#125;, &#123;&#125;)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the regclass on the dest reg too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.setRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64isd/#a35ad1b8db0dfad0b69c9185c5fe24e19aa2e9d9d7c30818fd5ba551f8d3f0af34">ADRP</a>.getReg(0), &amp;AArch64::GPR64RegClass);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MO&#95;TAGGED on the page indicates a tagged address. Set the tag now. We do so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by creating a MOVK that sets bits 48-63 of the register to (global address</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// + 4294967296 - PC) &gt;&gt; 48 The additional 4294967296 offset here is to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// prevent an incorrect tag being generated during relocation when the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// global appears before the code section. Without the offset, a global at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#96;0x0f00&#39;0000&#39;0000&#39;1000&#96; (i.e. at &#96;0x1000&#96; with tag &#96;0xf&#96;) that&#39;s referenced</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by code at &#96;0x2000&#96; would result in &#96;0x0f00&#39;0000&#39;0000&#39;1000 - 8192 =</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0x0eff&#39;ffff&#39;ffff&#39;f000&#96;, meaning the tag would be incorrectly set to &#96;0xe&#96;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instead of &#96;0xf&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This assumes that we&#39;re in the small code model so we can assume a binary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size of &lt;= 4GB, which makes the untagged PC relative offset positive. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// binary must also be loaded into address range &#91;0, 2^48). Both of these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// properties need to be ensured at runtime when using tagged addresses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OpFlags &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64ii/#ae22a65863fdb02ce99abf9ee08bcbb71aefb2c1834e49df9715967d4a2c9c99e8">AArch64II::MO&#95;TAGGED</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Should not have folded in an offset for a tagged global!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Intrinsic::aarch64&#95;mops&#95;memset&#95;tag: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here we just try to handle vector loads/stores where our value type might</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerhelper">LegalizerHelper</a> &amp;Helper)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When there is no integer popcount instruction (FEAT&#95;CSSC isn&#39;t available),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it can be more efficiently lowered to the following sequence that uses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// AdvSIMD registers/instructions as long as the copies to/from the AdvSIMD</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registers are cheap.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  FMOV    D0, X0        // copy 64-bit int to vector, high bits zero&#39;d</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  CNT     V0.8B, V0.8B  // 8xbyte pop-counts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  ADDV    B0, V0.8B     // sum 8xbyte pop-counts</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  UMOV    X0, V0.B&#91;0&#93;   // copy byte result back to integer reg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For 128 bit vector popcounts, we lower to the following sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1986"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  cnt.16b   v0, v0  // v8s16, v4s32, v2s64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1987"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  uaddlp.8h v0, v0  // v8s16, v4s32, v2s64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1988"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  uaddlp.4s v0, v0  //        v4s32, v2s64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1989"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  uaddlp.2d v0, v0  //               v2s64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1990"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1991"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For 64 bit vector popcounts, we lower to the following sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1992"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  cnt.8b    v0, v0  // v4s16, v2s32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1993"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  uaddlp.4h v0, v0  // v4s16, v2s32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1994"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  uaddlp.2s v0, v0  //        v2s32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1995"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1996"><Highlight kind="normal">  MachineIRBuilder &amp;MIRBuilder = Helper.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legalizerhelper/#ae50d11fc026093629c27142780ff1405">MIRBuilder</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><Highlight kind="normal">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adea5cfab927f82e2664c69c86f8f572fa3d568f5eb87e416770be5faa91da094f">IsData</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getImm();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsStream = Locality == 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Locality != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Locality &lt;= 3 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Prefetch locality out-of-range&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The locality degree is the opposite of the cache speed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Put the number the other way around.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The encoding starts at 0 for level 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><Highlight kind="normal">    Locality = 3 - Locality;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2304"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2305"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2306"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PrfOp = (IsWrite &lt;&lt; 4) | (!IsData &lt;&lt; 3) | (Locality &lt;&lt; 1) | IsStream;</Highlight></CodeLine>
